1.text: And working together with him we entreat also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain

2.text: (for he saith, At an acceptable time I hearkened unto thee, And in a day of salvation did I succour thee: behold, now is the acceptable time; behold, now is the day of salvation):

3.text: giving no occasion of stumbling in anything, that our ministration be not blamed;

4.text: but in everything commending ourselves, as ministers of God, in much patience, in afflictions, in necessities, in distresses,

5.text: in stripes, in imprisonments, in tumults, in labours, in watchings, in fastings;

6.text: in pureness, in knowledge, in longsuffering, in kindness, in the Holy Ghost, in love unfeigned,

7.text: in the word of truth, in the power of God; by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left,

8.text: by glory and dishonour, by evil report and good report; as deceivers, and yet true;

9.text: as unknown, and yet well known; as dying, and behold, we live; as chastened, and not killed;

10.text: as sorrowful, yet alway rejoicing; as poor, yet making many rich; as having nothing, and yet possessing all things.

11.text: Our mouth is open unto you, O Corinthians, our heart is enlarged.

12.text: Ye are not straitened in us, but ye are straitened in your own affections.

13.text: Now for a recompense in like kind (I speak as unto my children), be ye also enlarged.

14.text: Be not unequally yoked with unbelievers: for what fellowship have righteousness and iniquity? or what communion hath light with darkness?

15.text: And what concord hath Christ with Belial? or what portion hath a believer with an unbeliever?

16.text: And what agreement hath a temple of God with idols? for we are a temple of the living God; even as God said, I will dwell in them, and walk in them; and I will be their God, and they shall be my people.

17.text: Wherefore Come ye out from among them, and be ye separate, saith the Lord, And touch no unclean thing; And I will receive you,

18.text: And will be to you a Father, And ye shall be to me sons and daughters, saith the Lord Almighty.
